data.text: @_MaccaNZ You could be locked down for months.

@_MaccaNZ Are you isolating again for a new exposure? (I ask because the two Omicron variants and Delta don’t give each-other much cross immunity). Either way I hope you are all well! Also, research into long-covid and treatment is well under way (including some ppl cured : case reports).
@wahinetoa7 We are. We’re out on parole now 🙂
@_MaccaNZ Wow thats so lovely. 🙂 Hope you're all doing OK?
@JerKaphant We have all had it. Entire family caught it, almost impossible to not have transmission between four kids under 8 years old. And obviously, we got it cos we can’t lock them away, haha

@_MaccaNZ I hope you don’t have it 🙏 but if you do, ensure your house is well aired and ventilated to reduce high-dose aerosol transmission between family members. Keep the chocolates for post-recovery celebration (the virus *loves* sugar); get well soon 🙏
